name: Jiji's Adventure
description:
Short game done as an assignment for school.

We had to take a movie excerpt and turn in into a short game using Click Team Fusion 2.5. I wanted to show the scene in Kiki's Delivery Service where Jiji goes to meet Lily, even if it isn't explicitly shown in the movie.

Art / Animation / Game Design by Valy.
Softwares : Click Team Fusion 2.5 for programming, Clip Studio Paint and Photoshop for the art.
Background music : Surrogate Jiji, original soundtrack from the movie by Joe Hisaishi.

All rights belong to their respective owners.
